what sets this hat apart is that it's crocheted flat, making it perfect for beginners. get ready to be both comfy and stylish with us today!

✨ what size can i make this beanie hat? ✨

✔️ beanie hat - 8 sizes: baby to adult
this hat is crocheted flat. we will be working in rows from the side across. the best part about this design is that we will be working the decreases of the crown and the ribbing at the same time! so, if you can make a rectangle, you can make this hat. once we've made the rectangle, we'll join the edges, and use the starting tail to close up the top of the hat.
easy peasy!
